name: Faith Williams
text: I almost always get what I order.. ALMOST. When I do receive what I ordered its hot and delicious. The only problem I've been experiencing as of late is that they run out of sodas often and now dough?

text: So I seem to be having issues lately with this location. They never take any of my promo codes it says not honored at this location. Then I tried to order a pan pizza 3 days in a row and it said they were out of that crust all 3 days. Then â€¦More

text: Delivery guy came driving up with huge Trump flag on the back of his truck. I don't care who you are voting for but when you are working, you should be professional. He did not have a mask and stood quite close.  The seals on the boxes were â€¦More

name: N H
text:
Be prepared to cut your own bread sticks.
Even after requesting the bread sticks be cut, we were told Pizza Hut no longer does that.  So we have to cut them ouselves.  This is ridiculous.  Just cut the bread sticks! Just cut them!

Wont be returning to this store EVER!!!!

text: Terrible.  Several times in the past, I have ordered and received a cheese only calzone. Tonight, the call center said it could not be done, and when asked to speak to store manager, I was disconnected. I will never order food from here again.

text: Delicious, and I mean delicious food! It's weird and difficult to describe, but my pizza was airy and packed full of flavor. Always upgrade to the garlic butter crust... it's worth it!

name: Jack Hodge
text:
Sunday 1-12-19 @ 1:30 pm Dixie Hwy Fairfield, Oh. Worse pizza ever.
I m guessing a table spoon of sauce on this pizza. Could not taste any sauce at all. Minimal cheese and pepperoni. Very dry , blan pizza. Waste of money. Ruined football game for sure.
